snippet.title: ARISEN Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
ARISEN is a narrative card game where you use your emotions to create your own story in a dark fantasy universe. You are ripped from your home village and awaken on a warship alongside many prisoners, both elves and humans. As the adventure progresses, you will gain more and more power, until you finally break free. What will you do when you are free? Will you help others or enjoy the benefits of your position?

💻 Wishlist ARISEN on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1101670?utm_source=YTB

🎙 Discord:  https://discord.gg/bNqj4y​​
👍 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MaratusGames​​
🐦 Twitter: https://twitter.com/MaratusGames​​
📷 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/maratusgames/​​
🚩 Website: https://maratusgames.com/​​


Trailer credits

External:
Trailer by: Sarah Gonidec, Uko Creative 
Background art: Gaelle Hersent 
Character Art & Storyboard: Lycoris
Music: Yann "Kayji" Rayon 
Key Art: Lowenael

Core team:
Trailer Production: Ben Dimanche
Based on the story of Anaïs Berly-Godefroid
Additional character art and design: Elene Spago 
Also thanks to Jade Balarni, My-Loan Lam and Wendy Broeckx.
